frontmatter.title: Saint Michael Archangel in the other sources

metadata.description: Other Texts of the Old Testament where Archangel Saint-Michael appears.

articleBody:
Archangel Michael according to other sources

Archangel Michael according to chapter 12 of the book of Daniel, verses 1 to 3

[Dn 12, 1-3]

  1. At that time there shall arise Michael, the great prince, guardian of your people;
  2. It shall be a time unsurpassed in distress since the nation began until that time.
  3. At that time your people shall escape, everyone who is found written in the book.
  4. Many of those who sleep in the dust of the earth shall awake;
  5. Some to everlasting life, others to reproach and everlasting disgrace.
  6. But those with insight shall shine brightly like the splendor of the firmament,
  7. And those who lead the many to justice shall be like the stars forever.

Book of Daniel, chapter 12, verses 1 to 3, Liturgical Translation of the New Testament
